title: How to know the song name of a YouTube video - Quora

response.answer_text: First install Shazam on your mobile phone, launch the app, play the YouTube video on your desktop and bring the phone near the computer speaker. Alternatively, if these apps aren't available for your mobile phone Read more : http://techzib.com/find-song-in-youtube-video/
If you have iOS 8 you can use the integrated SIRI by saying "name that tune". That is the same as using song identifier Shazaam.
